text: Ani tyancya ya kathanamule ki amhi mariyamace putra isa masihaci hatya karuna takali, je allahace paigambara hote, vastavika na tara tyanni hatya keli, na tyanna sulavara cadhavile, parantu tyancyasathi isaci chabi banavili geli1 niscitaca isa yancyavisayi matabheda karanare sansayata padale aheta. Kevala atakalicya gostivara calanyakherija tyanna kasalehi jnana nahi. Evadhe niscita ki tyanca vadha kela gela nahi
